languages.text: {n}С лязгом колено Оптикона-22 упирается в пол. Головы, покрытые алыми капюшонами, склоняются.{/n} "Да будет прерван Цикл".
{n}There is a clang as Opticon-22's knee presses into the floor. Crimson-hooded heads are bowed.{/n} "Let the Cycle be discontinued."
languages.original_text: {n}С лязгом колено Оптикона-22 упирается в пол. Головы, покрытые алыми капюшонами, склоняются.{/n} "Да будет прерван Цикл".

traits.locale_text: {n}There's a clang as Opticon's knee presses into the floor. Scarlet-hooded heads are bowed.{/n} "Let the Cycle be discontinued."
traits.speaker: Opticon22

languages.text: {n}オプティコン-22の膝が床を押し続けるので、ガチャガチャと音がする。真紅のフードを被った頭がお辞儀をした。{/n}「サイクルを断ち切れ」
languages.original_text: {n}There is a clang as Opticon-22's knee presses into the floor. Crimson-hooded heads are bowed.{/n} "Let the Cycle be discontinued."

traits.locale_text: {n}オプティコン-22の膝が床を押し続けるので、ガチャガチャと音がする。真紅のフードを被った頭がお辞儀をした。{/n}「サイクルを断ち切れ」
traits.speaker: Opticon22

languages.text: {n}奥普蒂孔22号跪在地上，膝盖“砰”地一声响了起来。他低下了戴着深红色兜帽的头。{/n}“让循环终止吧。”
languages.original_text: {n}There is a clang as Opticon-22's knee presses into the floor. Crimson-hooded heads are bowed.{/n} "Let the Cycle be discontinued."

traits.locale_text: {n}奥普蒂孔22号跪在地上，膝盖“砰”地一声响了起来。他低下了戴着红色兜帽的头。{/n}“让循环终止吧。”
traits.speaker: Opticon22

languages.text: {n}Es klappert, als das Knie von Opticon-22 auf dem Boden aufsetzt. Köpfe in Purpurkapuzen verneigen sich.{/n} "Auf dass der Zyklus nicht fortgesetzt werde!"
languages.original_text: {n}There is a clang as Opticon-22's knee presses into the floor. Crimson-hooded heads are bowed.{/n} "Let the Cycle be discontinued."

traits.locale_text: {n}Es klappert, als Opticons Knie auf dem Boden aufsetzt. Köpfe mit Purpurkapuzen verbeugen sich.{/n} "Auf dass der Zyklus nicht fortgesetzt werde!"
traits.speaker: Opticon22

languages.text: {n}Un claquement métallique retentit lorsqu'Opticon-22 met un genou à terre. Autour de lui, les têtes encapuchonnées de rouge s'inclinent révérencieusement.{/n} « Que le cycle soit rompu. »
languages.original_text: {n}There is a clang as Opticon-22's knee presses into the floor. Crimson-hooded heads are bowed.{/n} "Let the Cycle be discontinued."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un claquement métallique retentit lorsqu'Opticon-22 met un genou à terre. Autour de lui, les têtes encapuchonnées de rouge s'inclinent révérencieusement.{/n} « Que le cycle soit rompu. »
traits.speaker: Opticon22

languages.text: {n}Opticon-22 hinca una rodilla en el suelo con un ruido metálico. Las capuchas carmesíes se inclinan con reverencia.{/n} «Que se interrumpa el Ciclo».
languages.original_text: {n}There is a clang as Opticon-22's knee presses into the floor. Crimson-hooded heads are bowed.{/n} "Let the Cycle be discontinued."

traits.locale_text: {n}Opticon-22 hinca una rodilla en el suelo con un ruido metálico. Las capuchas carmesíes se inclinan con reverencia.{/n} «Que se interrumpa el Ciclo».
traits.speaker: Opticon22

languages.text: {n}Opticon-22'nin dizinin yere çarpmasından kaynaklı bir çınlama sesi duyuluyor. Kızıl kapüşonlu başlar eğiliyor.{/n} "Döngü'nün süreği bozulsun."
languages.original_text: {n}There is a clang as Opticon-22's knee presses into the floor. Crimson-hooded heads are bowed.{/n} "Let the Cycle be discontinued."
